name: Mother A.I
description:
Game made in 3 days for One game mechanic jam!

Earth has been taken over by an a.i called Mother.
The players job is to dodge. Score is based on the player moving while the level of difficulty is based on time.

Use the "Enter" key to skip through the menu & dialog

Use W.A.S.D for movement

Spacebar for a little boost!

Controller support only works on the menu a.k.a lack of time haha :D

Best played in fullscreen.
